title: Morgana JG
body: So I have a Morgana JG and I am not allowed to flame her or I get in trouble? Where is the logic in that? Where is the troll report button????/

replies.body: Are you guys serious? Do you think you can with the game with a Morgana JG. The answer is, most of the time, you are not going to win. Trolling should be a reportable offense this way I won't get in trouble for flaming.

Just because you don't agree with someone, shouldn't mean you jump straight to flaming harassing them. It's much more productive to stay calm and try talking to them in a normal manner to see why they're doing what you consider trolling. Maybe they're legitimately trying something new, or might actually be newer to the game.

Plus, wouldn't want to risk flaming at someone over their choice of jungler and getting reported over it.
